title: High noon Yasuo Q sound bug

embed.description: High Noon Yasuo Skin Spotlight - League of Legends Yasuo Skin Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkOZw6Eyzt9rK8zR5d9MEvw?sub_confirmation=1 Yasuo Spotlight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uoAeFyC-TaU Yasuo Jungle: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JTPOid39_Do Yasuo Mid Gameplay: http://youtu.be/txeN8tST_fE Yasuo Teaser: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jQkR7wLL3Gg Yasuo Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=duUt7SlhrOU Yasuo Voice: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1jufIeGQz3Y Way of the Wanderer [Passive] Resolve: Moving grants Yasuo Flow, which is tracked on his resource bar -- moving faster grants more Flow.

body:
i have recently bought the yasuo skin but I didnt hear the gun shot sound that there use to was on the skin..
is that a bug or is it just changed?
i played with friends and they cant hear the gunshot sound ether.
i watched the skins spotlight and i can clearly hear a gunshot but there is non in game.
please can someone explain me if this is changed or its just a bug,
I also have checked if it doenst require 100 critchance but that doesnt matter.
{{champion:157}} 

greetings

replies.body: I feels like they removed it...it makes the skin and they should put it back.{{champion:157}}
Please fix this i love yasuo i main{{champion:157}}  him and high noon is my favourite skin on him pls riot
I hope this will get fixed soon :/ It's my favourite yasuo skin ! :)

Hey r3n33s123  -

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating.
I have the same problem too !! I have this skin about a year now and it never buged like that ... plz fix it !!!  That q's sound is what makes this skin so epic !!!
I have the same, I bought the skin a few weeks ago. At first, I was hearing the sound, but it has now dissappeared.
I recently bought it and I've also experienced that it's not there when triggering Q. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
